Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • Rule

  • public class Rule
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a rule of the knowledge base. Those are constructed from a String formatted as "h1;h2;...;hk=>c", with hi the i-th atom of the hypothesis and c the conclusion. A static int is used to automatically number the Rules by order of creation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rule(java.lang.String s)
      Constructs a rule from a String formatted as "h1;h2;...;hk=>c", with hi the i-th atom of the hypothesis and c the conclusion.
